message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in the product, $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11,000 is still a little too high for me.  I'm happy to pay $10,500.  This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to accept.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $11,200. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
